com.tightdb
Class TableView<T extends Row>

java.lang.Object
  com.tightdb.TableView<T>
Type Parameters:
T - 
public class TableView<T extends Row>
extends java.lang.Object

The tableview represents a readonly view of a table. The view holds less than or equal number of rows from the original table.

Author:
anirban
